actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to extend the time for using funds appropriated to carry out the rural environmental assistance program (REAP) and the rural environmental conservation program (RECP) for the fiscal years ending June 30, 1973 and June 30, 1974.

summary.text: Extends, until December 31, 1975, the time for using funds appropriated to carry out specified activities under the Rural Environmental Assistance Program (REAP) and the Rural Environmental Conservation Program (RECP) for the fiscal years ending June 30, 1973, and June 30, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to extend the time for using funds appropriated to carry out the rural environmental assistance program (REAP) and the rural environmental conservation program (RECP) for the fiscal years ending June 30, 1973 and June 30, 1974.
